snippet: Mr. Bowman was a novelist and cultural critic whose first books, “Let the Dog Drive” and “Bunny Modern,” received wide praise in the 1990s for their satirical voice.
abstract: David Bowman, novelist and cultural critic, dies at age 54.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bowman was a novelist and cultural critic whose first books, “Let the Dog Drive” and “Bunny Modern,” received wide praise in the 1990s for their satirical voice.

headline.seo: David Bowman, Author of ‘Let the Dog Drive,’ Dies at 54
headline.main: David Bowman, Satirical Novelist, Dies at 54
headline.print_headline: David Bowman, 54, Novelist Who Had a Satirical Bent
